== Ubuntu-AU Members ==

This page contains the current list of members of the AustralianTeam.

=== New Members ===
If you're an Aussie user of Ubuntu and you want to join the AustralianTeam, feel free to add yourself to the map and to the list of members below. A preliminary guide for those interested in joining or new members can be found on the <nowiki>[[AustralianTeam-Members-NewMembers|New Members]]</nowiki> page.

=== Member List ===
(sorted alphabetically by state then last name)
